document_data.caption: A map showing the River Akax flowing between the Akanamere and the Bay of Chessenta.
document_data.name: River Akax
document_data.mainbody: The '''River Akax''' was a river located in the country of [[Chessenta]].{{Cite interactive atlas|B1dlc}}
document_data.Geography: The river flowed from the [[Akanamere]] in the southwest to empty into the western coast of the [[Bay of Chessenta]]. The river split the city of [[Soorenar]] into eastern and western halves.
document_data.Activity: The entire length of the River Akax was navigable by small and medium-sized vessels.
